org.apache.xalan.xslt
Class StylesheetHandler

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--org.xml.sax.helpers.ParserAdapter
        |
        +--org.apache.xalan.xslt.StylesheetHandler
public class StylesheetHandler
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.ParserAdapter

Initializes and processes a stylesheet via SAX events. If you need to alter the code in here, it is not for the faint-of-heart, due to the state tracking that has to be done due to the SAX event model.
